resources.string: (anniversary)->Happy Anniversary, Love. My love for you grows with each passing year.
(anniversary)-> After 10 years, I still feel like we are newlyweds.
(baby welcome)-> Congratulations on the birth of you new baby.
(baby welcome)-> Congratulations on your new bundle of joy.
(graduation)-> Congratulations! Glad to hear the good news!
(graduation)-> Congratulations! Keep up the good work.
(wedding)-> To happy endings and new beginnings. Congratulations!
(wedding)-> - Congratulations and best wishes for a beautiful future.
(birthday)-> May all your birthday wishes come true!
(corporate)-> Its always a pleasure working with you.
(corporate)-> Best of luck in your new venture.
